scripts.migration:generate: npm run build && ts-node -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register ./node_modules/typeorm/cli.js migration:generate --outputJs -d dist/src/config/database.config.js
scripts.migration:run: npm run build && ts-node -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register ./node_modules/typeorm/cli.js migration:run -d dist/src/config/database.config.js
scripts.migration:create: npm run build && ts-node -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register ./node_modules/typeorm/cli.js migration:create -d dist/src/config/database.config.js
scripts.migration:show: npm run build && ts-node -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register ./node_modules/typeorm/cli.js migration:show -d dist/src/config/database.config.js
scripts.migration:revert: npm run build && ts-node -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register ./node_modules/typeorm/cli.js migration:revert -d dist/src/config/database.config.js

hooks.pre-commit: npm run lint:fix && npm test && npm run build
